snippet: Rick Santorum is the first candidate this year to visit all of Iowa’s 99 counties, but he has yet to catch up in the polls to Donald J. Trump, who has rarely visited the state.
abstract: Rick Santorum is first presidential candidate to visit all 99 Iowa counties, completing 'full Grassley,' named after senior Iowa Sen Charles E. Grassley; strategists debate whether old-fashioned grassroots campaigning is becoming less important than television and social media exposure in winning influential first primary in Iowa, threatening state's special status.
lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum is the first candidate this year to visit all of Iowa’s 99 counties, but he has yet to catch up in the polls to Donald J. Trump, who has rarely visited the state.

headline.main: Visiting 99 Counties in Iowa Doesn’t Get Candidates as Far as It Used to
headline.print_headline: Visiting 99 Counties in Iowa Doesn’t Get Candidates as Far as It Used To
